channel.title: Halloween
channel.description:
Happy [b]Halloween[/b], MoparScapers!
Since I don't want this thread to be locked, I will ask a simple question. What do you all plan on doing for Halloween?

item.title: Halloween
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:42, topic:465627”][quote author=strucker link=topic=571400.msg4137094#msg4137094 date=1351802335]
Just gonna fap, come fap with me if you want
[/quote]

no pornographic discussion men!!1[/quote]
cmon its hween

Fails:

Keep in mind; this thread was created on behalf of Halloween, not porn chat.

We can all be perverted once
OT: Im grounded and haven’t done anything about hween

Read full topic

item.title: Halloween
item.dc:creator: @F_A_I_L_S Fails
item.description:
@F_A_I_L_S wrote:

Speaking of slenderman, a friend of mine gave me the slender game. I though it was going to be scary, sad to say it wasn’t.

OP: I don’t trick-or-treat anymore so I rely on my little brother to get loads of candy. Well, he came home with a half bucket of candy, most of it being popcorn. Who hands out popcorn for Halloween?!

Read full topic

item.title: Halloween
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:32, topic:465627”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=571400.msg4136810#msg4136810 date=1351788254]

it’s been awhile since I been in USA but what the fuck is a Papa Murphy’s? is that like a knockoff papa john’s???
[/quote]Nope. It’s better than Papa Johns. Basically, it’s a ‘take n bake’ pizza place. They make you a pizza, completely fresh, (kinda like Subway if youve been there), and then you take it home and bake it. It means you can cook it however you want etc, and it’s more fun than just having it delivered. They may just not have had them wherever you are from, but it’s been a weekly tradition for my family for over 5 years.

Is it just me or does that take away the entire point of ordering pizza?[/quote]Not really… do you want to make your own dough, buy and prepare ingredients, and assemble every pizza you make? The only things they don’t do are bake it and deliver it. I guess if the only reason you order pizza is to get it fast, then it probably isn’t for you, but my family has had fun with it for years.

Read full topic

item.title: Halloween
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:31, topic:465627”][quote author=Miss Silabsoft link=topic=571400.msg4136593#msg4136593 date=1351762959]
it’s been awhile since I been in USA but what the fuck is a Papa Murphy’s? is that like a knockoff papa john’s???
[/quote]Nope. It’s better than Papa Johns. Basically, it’s a ‘take n bake’ pizza place. They make you a pizza, completely fresh, (kinda like Subway if youve been there), and then you take it home and bake it. It means you can cook it however you want etc, and it’s more fun than just having it delivered. They may just not have had them wherever you are from, but it’s been a weekly tradition for my family for over 5 years.[/quote]

Is it just me or does that take away the entire point of ordering pizza?

Read full topic

item.title: Halloween
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Miss Silabsoft, post:30, topic:465627”]it’s been awhile since I been in USA but what the fuck is a Papa Murphy’s? is that like a knockoff papa john’s???[/quote]Nope. It’s better than Papa Johns. Basically, it’s a ‘take n bake’ pizza place. They make you a pizza, completely fresh, (kinda like Subway if youve been there), and then you take it home and bake it. It means you can cook it however you want etc, and it’s more fun than just having it delivered. They may just not have had them wherever you are from, but it’s been a weekly tradition for my family for over 5 years.
